Silas Nwankwo (amuru n'ubochi 12 n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2003)  bu onye ọkachamara n’egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria na-agba dị ka onye ọkpọ maka klọb Sweden Mjällby  na Allsvenskan
Nwankwo gbaara klọb Naijiria Crown FC ruo ọnwa July n'afọ 2019, tupu ọ gafeeSunshine Stars
Mgbe otu afọ gara,, ọ gara n'ihu igbara Nasarawa United na NPFL na-eme ngosi 35 ma na-enye goolu 19 na oge 2020-21
N'ubochi 3 n'ọnwa Febrụwarị n'afọ 2022, Nwankwo bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta afọ atọ na klọb Sweden Mjällby
